abstract: Genzyme, one the oldest and largest biotechnology companies in the United States, said Wednesday that it had reached a settlement with Carl C. Icahn in their bitter proxy contest.
snippet: Genzyme, one the oldest and largest biotechnology companies in the United States, said Wednesday that it had reached a settlement with Carl C. Icahn in their bitter proxy contest.
lead_paragraph: Genzyme, one the oldest and largest biotechnology companies in the United States, said Wednesday that it had reached a settlement with Carl C. Icahn in their bitter proxy contest.

headline.main: Genzyme and Icahn Settle Proxy Fight
